name: Latest Registered Users
author: RND Experts

sections.description:
This plugin adds a new, sortable, columns to the users lists, which shows the date and time they registered. Admin can download the user list in CSV file. This plugin also support to multisite.

Privacy Notes

This plugin does not track any additional data other than what WordPress natively collects upon registration. It just makes the data visble.

GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation)

The plugin is GDPR compliant. It does not use or store any kind of user information/data. In fact, it’s functionality has nothing to do with user data (personal or otherwise). So there’s that.

License

MIT

You should have received a copy of the MIT License along with this program.
If not, see http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT.

Donate

If you like this plugin and find it useful, consider making a [donation] (https://paypal.me/rndexperts) :).
sections.installation:
• Only you need to install the wordpress.
  • Either using FTP or Dashboard you can install the plugin.
  • No shortcode required to show the data
  • You can only install and active the plugin that’s it.
sections.faq:
Can Download the User list?

Yes, You can download the user in CSV file.

Can I sort the user using Date?

Yes, you can

Does this work on MultiSite?

Yes it does.

Can I check the last login of the user?

Yes, You can.

What about if plugin stop to work?

You only need to send me the email at webrndexperts@gmail.com with details issue you have face and if any screenshot that will be great and help full to me to tackle the issue.
sections.changelog:

Initial Plugin Development and tested upto WordPress Version 5.6

1.2

Bug Fixes for CSV and tested upto WordPress Version 6.3

1.3

Tested upto WordPress Version 6.3

1.4

sections.reviews:
Exactly what I needed! This should be a core WordPress feature!

By jtsalvo on October 19, 2023

We had a spam attack sign up thousands of fake users to our site. Mass deleting a certain time frame of users sounds like a pretty simple task, until you realize WordPress has 0 functionality to sort by date. This plugin saved me hours of time! Simple and very useful

Does what it says

By machinelf on October 18, 2022

Nothing more, nothing less. Great if you wanna clean house. SO SATISFYING

short_description: Add a sortable columns to the users list to show last login date, registration date and also export users to csv file.
